donor_name: UNITED STATES AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT (USAID)
outputs.output_descr:
1. Training and capacity-building of engineers and artisan
2. Demonstration of Seismic Strengthening and Safe Construction 
3. Development of methodologies to assess Vulnerability of Existing Housing Stock
4. Knowledge management and networking

project_descr: Skills and institutional capacities strengthened for disaster and climate resilient construction for successful implementation of the Bhutan National Recovery and Reconstruction Plan 2011-2016
project_title: Capacity Building in Disaster Resilient Construction
